definitions.definition: a public road in a city or town, typically with houses and buildings on one or both sides.
examples: the narrow, winding streets of Greenwich Village

definitions.definition: used to refer to the financial markets and activities on Wall Street.
the roads or public areas of a city or town.
examples: every week, fans stop me in the street

definitions.definition: of or relating to the outlook, values, or lifestyle of those young people who are perceived as composing a fashionable urban subculture.

examples: he ministered to street people in storefront missions

definitions.definition: performing or being performed on the street.
